Change Sprite to another sprite.descr: Change the current sprite into a diffent one. While any combination is valid, some restrictions may affect the workability of the game flow.

Clear Screen.descr: Clear the whole screen and paint the background with the provided color.

Draw Image.descr: Draw an image on the screen.

Draw Rectangle.descr: Draw a rectangle on the screen.

Get Frame Count from this Sprite.descr: Count the number of frames for this Sprite.

Get Frame Count in a FrameSet.descr: Get the number of frame in FrameSet.

Get Screen Size.descr: Get the window width and height.

Play Music.descr: Play a streaming music file. The path is relative to your lgckdb file.

Play Sound.descr: Play a sound file. Replace This sound has to be stored inside the database. Lookup under "sounds" tab.

Unmark as goal.descr: A sprite can be marked as goal toward completing the level. You can flip off this flag.

Show This Sprite.descr: Show the sprite. Make it visible.

Hide This Sprite.descr: Hide sorite. Mark this sprite as invisible.

Fire Bullet.descr: Fire a bullet from the current aim of this sprite.

Sprite Fall Into The Abyss.descr: This is a template for handling falling off the screen. This should be added to the `OnLanding` event

Sprite Fall (for varying heights).descr: This is a template for handling fall from various heights. This should added to the `OnFall` event.

Breakable brick/bridge.descr: Create a breakable brick/bridge. This should be added to the `OnHandler` event.
